KUYAS.IS.summary: Kuyumcukent Gayrimenkul Yatirimlari A.S. operates as a real estate development company in Turkey. It constructs commercial and residential projects. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

PEKGY.IS.long_name: Peker Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi
PEKGY.IS.summary: Peker Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi engages in the real estate business in Turkey. It develops, holds, trades, rents, and sells real estate projects; and trades in securities. The company also involved in the fixture of vehicles and facilities. Further, it engages in the media business, as well as provides site management services. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
